edu.um.cps2004.task1.engine

Class TTTWarEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.um.cps2004.task1.engine.TTTWarEngine

  • public abstract class TTTWarEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    The Tic Tac Toe war engine. Note that this class does not determine the intelligence of the robot players but simply implements the 'rules of engagement' (i.e. the game).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    JP

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected GameBoard board
      The board we are going to play upon
      protected TTTPlayer playerO
      The two players, one will be playing X and the other will be playing O.
      protected TTTPlayer playerX
      The two players, one will be playing X and the other will be playing O.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TTTWarEngine(TTTRobot robotX, TTTRobot robotO)
      The constructor of the robots war engine.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void play()
      Plays the game (gives a turn each to the players to play) Should set a winner (at the end of the encounter if non draw game).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • playerX

        protected final TTTPlayer playerX
        The two players, one will be playing X and the other will be playing O. Eventually it might be a good idea to have a list of players, instead of hardcoding two (this way we can pair teams up etc.)

      • playerO

        protected final TTTPlayer playerO
        The two players, one will be playing X and the other will be playing O. Eventually it might be a good idea to have a list of players, instead of hardcoding two (this way we can pair teams up etc.)

      • board

        protected final GameBoard board
        The board we are going to play upon

    • Constructor Detail

      • TTTWarEngine

        public TTTWarEngine(TTTRobot robotX,
                    TTTRobot robotO)
        The constructor of the robots war engine.
        Parameters:
        robotX - An instance of the first robot, may not be null. This robot will play with X.
        robotO - An instance of the second robot, may not be null This robot will play with O.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public abstract void play()
        Plays the game (gives a turn each to the players to play) Should set a winner (at the end of the encounter if non draw game).
